body:
Hello, I decided to make three collages of the avicus community, you can use them on your profile, modify them or do whatever else you want with them!

Here they are, I hope you enjoy.

Single monitor wallpaper size:

Dual monitor wallpaper size:

replies.body:
To anyone I forgot I really can't do anything :( These were auto generated based on stats.

However you're probably in the big one and you're welcome to erase someone else's head and put your own in their place. C: Just make sure to download your head in 64x64

replies.body:
He auto-generated the faces base off the stats.
He didn't individually place each head on the picture.

I'm not quite sure how exactly but it wasn't head by head.
